definition: Total sum of standardized cashburn amounts aggregated over time, representing the monetary value of cashback given to users
Calculated cashback value converted to standard currency based on redemption type: coins divided by 166.67, goldcoins divided by 100, UPI amount plus 0.2478, otherwise original amount
Unified Payments Interface - a real-time payment system for instant money transfers and digital payments
Reward system offering cash benefits through various redemption types including coins, goldcoins, and UPI transactions
Month-to-Date - refers to the time period from the beginning of the current month up to the current date
Classification of how cashback is redeemed including coins, goldcoins, and UPI methods, each with different conversion rates
Status tracking for cashback processing including Given (3), Processing (2), and Pending (1) states
Count of distinct users who have SuperCash transactions in the selected time period
business_alias: Users, Unique Users, Number of Users, User Count

definition: Total sum of cashburn amounts across all transactions, aggregated from individual cashburn calculations
business_alias: Total Cash Burn, Cash Burn Sum, Total Cashburn, Cashburn Sum

definition: UPI SuperCash campaign identifier grouping transactions by specific promotional campaigns
Transaction status indicating completion state: Given (completed), Processing (in progress), Pending (awaiting fulfillment), or Unscratched (not activated)
Wallet platform or service associated with the SuperCash campaign
Calculated cashback amount based on redemption type: coins (amount/166.67), goldcoins (amount/100), UPI (amount+0.2478), or original amount for other types
Status category for cashback that has been successfully delivered to users (status=1, fulfillment_status=3)
Status category for cashback that is currently being processed (status=1, fulfillment_status=2)
Cashback status when status=1 and fulfillment_status=1, indicating cashback is awaiting processing
Status category for scratch cards that have not been scratched by users (status=2, fulfillment_status=1)
Redemption type for cashback where amount is divided by 166.67 to calculate cash burn
Redemption type for cashback where amount is divided by 100 to calculate cash burn
Month-to-date count of unique users who performed transactions on a daily basis
Unique count of user identifiers, representing the number of distinct users
Month-to-date count of unique users who have been gratified (received benefits) through the UPI SuperCash program
Cashback program related to UPI transactions offering rewards through various redemption types including coins, goldcoins, and direct UPI transfers
Calculated cash equivalent value based on redemption type: coins (amount/166.67), goldcoins (amount/100), UPI (amount+0.2478), or original amount for other types
Type of SuperCash redemption method including coins, goldcoins, UPI, and other payment methods
Marketing campaign identifier associated with SuperCash offers and promotions
Current state of SuperCash transaction including Given, Processing, Unscratched, and Pending statuses
Digital wallet type or payment method associated with the SuperCash transaction
